message.body: Not yet...I board my flight in about an hour, I should get into baltimore at about 1030...finally!
I just got back from a 2 day conference. Nice break from the grind. When you have a chance let me know which relatives haven"t rsvp'd and i'll start contactin
Okay, will do! Off the top of my head I think all but yaiyai and pj&jw have...I have to check though. Also just want to make sure matt & Stephanie aren't planning on bringing mia...
Did you mean je, i.e. Jan ellen? And are you saying you want ME to check on the mia thing?
Oh, yeah, I meant je as in jan ellen, oops. And maybe you could go through julie to check? I'm trying to think of what the most tactful way to check would be..
Yeah, i'm not sure. Is it a big problem if they do bring her?
Yes. I dont want to risk a baby crying during the ceremony or other key moments, it's disruptive. It's also an evening event and not super kid friendly...
